name: Tempo (itch) (Brian Kim)
description:
Tempo is a prototype game about Porter Robinson's album, Nurture. In the game, you're placed in the world imagined through the album of Nurture. Draw on the sky and take a look around the world I created :)

When I was creating this game, I was thinking about what a game interpreted based on music would look like. The prototype went through many iterations, from starting just as a long cutscene to a rhythm game, and now this. Although this is just a proof of concept, I hope to expand on this idea more in the future. 

Controls:

WASD - move

Space - jump

Mouse - look around

Left Click - draw

Created by: Brian Kim

Music: Wind Tempos (piano cover) by Keudae
